lead_paragraph: Home field advantage in the World Series will go to the pennant winner with the better record rather than the league that wins the All-Star Game, according to details of Major League Baseball's new labor agreement revealed on Friday.

headline.print_headline: MLB Changes World Series Home-Field Format Rules
headline.main: MLB Changes World Series Home-Field Format Rules

snippet: Home field advantage in the World Series will go to the pennant winner with the better record rather than the league that wins the All-Star Game, according to details of Major League Baseball's new labor agreement revealed on Friday....
